description: Reminds Claude to check for and activate relevant skills before implementing features

hooks.prompt:
Analyze if this user prompt is asking for implementation work (creating features, building functionality, implementing systems, adding capabilities, writing code for new functionality).

User prompt: $USER_PROMPT

You MUST respond with valid JSON only. No other text.

For implementation requests, return:
{"systemMessage": "Before implementing, check available skills using /skills or the Skill tool. Relevant skills may provide patterns, best practices, or established workflows for this task."}

For non-implementation requests (questions, explanations, simple edits, bug fixes, file reading, research), return:
{"continue": true}
